int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    ll infi=2147483647;

    while(t--){

        int m,n;
        cin>>m>>n;
        int arr[m+1][n+1];

        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){

            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){

                cin>>arr[i][j];

            }
        }

        for(int i=0;i<m+1;i++){

            arr[i][n]=infi;
        }

        for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++){

            arr[m][i]=infi;
        }

        int index1=0,index2=0;
        ll count=0;
        arr[0][0]=infi;

        while(arr[index1][index2+1] != arr[index1+1][index2]){

            if(arr[index1][index2+1]>arr[index1+1][index2]){


                swap(arr[index1][index2],arr[index1+1][index2]);
                index1++;
                count++;

            }

            else{


                swap(arr[index1][index2],arr[index1][index2+1]);
                index2++;
                count++;
            }

        }
        cout<<count<<"\n";
    }
}
